about_the_game:
A tower defense game with brand new gameplay elements, innovatively combining the strategic tower defense with card battles. With dozens of different enemies, hundreds of unprecedented levels, monthly updated trial rankings, and rich holiday-themed events. All you need to do is constantly collect and synthesize cards, cultivate your own heroes and defensive towers, and you can drive the villains out of your homeland. Join this exciting tower defense battle now!

What you can do in the game:

Beat up the bad guys
Battle various types of enemies, from minotaurs to the undead, and even feathered demons!

Upgrade your heroes
Win new items with each victory and make your heroes stronger and even more brutal!

Tower defense + card collection and upgrading
The addictive depth of strategy and highly enjoyable card collecting mechanics will keep you hooked!

Treasures and rewards galore
Use a variety of tempting loot to enhance your combat power!

Game features:

1. Simple and easy:to-understand towerdefense basics, easyto operate.


2. Exquisite cartoon-style graphics suitable for all ages.


3. Freely combine battle strategies, choose different routes to strengthen your own combat power, whether it's towers, heroes, spells, etc.



4. Rich enemies and levels for a deeply immersive gaming experience.


5. Regularly updated leaderboard rankings and server-wide progress, you're not alone in the battle!


6. Rich and colorful holiday-themed events for continuous surprises.

name: Tower Monster Rush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64位
  • Processor: Core M3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Grahics Series
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not specified
  • Additional Notes: Not specified
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A tower defense game with brand new gameplay elements, innovatively combining the strategic tower defense with card battles.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Vietnamese, Korean
